Translations.Text: (hajharata ibrahime) kahyum ke allahana mokalela (pharista'o) tamaro sum hetu che
temane javaba apyo ke ame duracari koma tarapha mokalavamam avya che
jethi ame temana para matini kankari'o varasavi'e
je tara palanahara taraphathi nisanavali che, te hadavatavi nakhanara'o mate
basa! Jetala imanavala'o tyam hata, ame temane bacavi lidha
ane ame tyam musalmanonum phakata eka ja ghara joyum
ane ame tyam temana mate, je du:Khadayi yatanano dara rakhe che eka nisani chodi
musana (kis'sa) mam (pana amara tarapha thi eka nisani che) ke ame tene phira'ona tarapha khulla purava api mokalya
basa! Tene potana samarthya upara mondhu pheravyum ane kaheva lagyo a jadugara che athava to pagala che
Chevate ame tene ane tena laskarane amari yatanamam pakadi dariyamam nakhi didho ane te hato ja jhatakanine layaka
avi ja rite adamam (pana amara tarapha thi eka nisani che) jyare ame te'ona para ujjada pavana mokalyo
te je vastu para padati tene khokhara hadaka jevum (cure cura) kari nakhati hati
ane samuda (na kis'sa) mam pana (cetavani) che, jyare te'one kahevamam avyu ke tame thodaka divaso sudhi phayado uthavi lo
parantu te'o'e potana palanaharana adesano bhanga karyo, jethi te'one jotajatamam (vavajhoda) e nasta kari didha
basa! Na to te'o ubha tha'i sakya ane na to badalo la'i sakya
ane nuhani komane pana a pahela (avi ja dasa tha'i hati) te'o pana ghana ja avajnakari hata
akasane ame (potana) hatho vade banavyum che ane ni:Sanka ame vistrta karavavala che
ane dharati ne ame patharanum banavi didhum che. Basa! Ame khuba ja sari rite patharavavala che
ane dareka vastune ame jodakamam peda kari che. Jethi tame sikhamana prapta karo
basa! Tame allaha tarapha dodo bhago. Ni:Sanka hum tamane tena taraphathi khulle khulli cetavani apanaro chum
ane allaha sathe bija ko'ine pana pujya na theravo. Ni:Sanka hum tamane teni tarapha khulli cetavani apanara chum
avi ja rite je loko temana pahela hata, te'oni pase je pana payagambara avya te'o'e kahim didhu ke a to jadugara che athava to pagala che
sum a loko'e te vatani ekabijane vasiyata kari che? (Na) parantu a badha ja vidrohi che
to tame te'othi modhum pheravi lo, tamara para ko'i vandho nathi
ane sikhamana apata raho, ni:Sanka a sikhamana imanavala'one phayado pahoncadase
Mem jinnata ane manavi'one phakata etala mate ja peda karya che ke te'o phakata mari ja bandagi kare
na hum te'othi roji icchum chum ane na to mari iccha che ke a loko mane khavadave
allaha ta'ala to pote ja darekane roji pahoncadanara, saktimana ane takatavara che
basa! Je loko'e atyacara karyo che te'one pana te'ona sathi'o maphaka ja malase, jethi te'o utavala na kare
basa! Kharabi che, inkari'o mate te divase, je divasanum vacana temane apavamam avyum che
soganda che tura (eka parvatanum nama) na
ane lakhavamam avela kitabana
je patali khala upara (lakhayela) che
ane abada gharana
ane unci chatana
ane bhadakavavamam avela samudrana
ni:Sanka tamara palanaharani yatana tha'ine ja rahese
tene ko'i rokanara nathi
je divase akasa tharatharavi uthase
ane parvato calava lagase
te divase juthalavanara'o mate vinasa che
je potana vivadamam uchalakuda kari rahya che
je divase temane du:Kha apine jahannamani aga tarapha khenci lavavamam avase
a ja te jahannamani aga che jene tame juthalavata hata
(have batavo) sum a jadu che? Athava to tame jota ja nathi
ja'o, jahannamamam have tamaru dhiraja rakhavum ane na rakhavum tamara mate sarakhum che. Tamane phakata tamari karanino ja badalo apavamam avase
ni:Sanka sadacari loko jannato ane ne'amatomam che
je temane temana palanahare api che teno ananda la'i rahya che. Anetemana palanahare temane jahannamani yatanathi pana bacavi lidha che
tame masta khata pita raho te karyona badalamam je tame karata hata
kramika pathareli uttama asano upara takiya lagavela. Ane ame temana lagna gori-gori moti ankhovali (huro) sathe kari didha che

Je loko imana lavya ane temani santano'e pana imanamam temanum anusarana karyu, ame temani santanone temana sudhi pahoncadi da'isum ane ame temana karmamanthi ghatado nahim kari'e, dareka vyakti potana karmomam jakadayela che
ame temana mate phalo ane manapasanda gosta puskala pramanamam phelavi da'isum
mojamasti sathe jama (saraba) jhuntavi rahya hase. Je sarabamam na bakavasa hase ane na to papa
ane temani aju baju nana nana balako cali phari rahya hase. Jeva ke te'o moti hata je dhankela rakhya hata
ane andara andara eka-bijathi savala karase
kahese ke a pahela apane potana gharavala'othi khuba ja darata hata
basa! Allaha ta'ala'e amara upara khuba ja upakara karyo ane amane jhadapi garama hava'oni yatanathi bacavi lidha
ame pahelathi ja teni bandagi karata hata, ni:Sanka te upakari ane dayaluche
to tame samajavata raho, karanake tame potana palanaharani krpathi na to jyotisa cho ane na to pagala
sum inkari'o kahe che ke a kavi che? Ame tena para jamanani durghatanani (mrtyu) vata jo'i rahya che
kahim do! Tame pratiksa karo, hum pana tamari sathe pratiksa karanaro chum
sum te'one temani budhdhi avum ja sikhavade che athava to a ja loko balavakhora che
sum a loko kahe che ke a payagambare (kura'ana) pote ghadi kadhyum che? Vata evi che ke te imana nathi lavata
ham! Jo a loko sacca hoya to ana jevi eka (ja) vata to la'i ave
sum a loko ko'i sarjana karanara vagara jate ja peda tha'i gaya che? Athava to a pote sarjana karanara che
sum temane ja akasa ane dharatine peda karya che? Parantu a yakina na karavavala'o che
Athava sum temani pase tara palanaharana khajana che? Athava (te khajanana) dekharekha rakhanara che
athava to sum temani pase ko'i sidi che jena para cadhine avya che? (Jo avum ja che) to temano ko'i sambhalanara khulli dalila ape
sum allaha mate to putri'o che? Ane tamara tyam putro che
sum tame te lokothi ko'i mahenatanu iccho cho? Jethi a loko tena bharathi dabayela hoya
sum te loko pase adrasyanum jnana che? Jene te'o lakhi rahya hoya
sum a loko ko'i cala ramava icche che? Tame nisrcita tha'i java cala calanara (loko) inkari'o che
sum allaha sivaya te'ono ko'i ma'abuda (sacco pujya) che? (Kadapi nahim) allaha ta'ala te'ona bhagidaro theravavathi pavitra che
jo a loko akasana ko'i tukadane (dharati para) padato jo'i le, to pana ama ja kahese ke a to eka pachi eka vadala che
tame te'one chodi do, tyam sudhi ke te'o te divasane jo'i le je divase te'o behosa kari nakhavamam avase
je divase te'one temani cala ko'i kama nahim ave ane na to temane madada karavamam avase
ni:Sanka atyacari'o mate a sivaya biji ghani yatana'o pana che. Parantu te lokomam vadhare loko abhana che
tame potana palanaharana adesani pratiksamam dhairya vade kama lo, ni:Sanka tame amari ankho same savare jyare na utho potana palanaharani pavitrata ane prasansa bayana karo
ane ratre pana tena namanum smarana karo ane tara'o athamavana samaye pana
soganda che tara'ona jyare te pade
tamara sathi na to rastathi bhatakela che ane na to pathabhrasta che
ane na potani iccha pramane ko'i vata kari che
te to phakata vahi che je utaravamam ave che
(vahi) ne takatavara pharista'e sikhavadyum che
Je saktisali che. Pachi te sidho ubho tha'i gayo
ane te unca akasana kinara para hato
pachi najika thayo ane utari avyo
basa! Te be kamanona barabara jagya rahi ga'i. Tenathi pana ochi
basa! Tene allahana bandane vahi pahoncadi je kami pana pahoncadyu
hrdaye juthum na theravyu je kami (payagambare) joyu
sum tame jhadhado karo cho teni sathe? Je (payagambara) ju'e che
(jibra'ila) ne tame biji vakhata pana joya hata
sidaratul muntaha pase
teni ja pase jannatul ma'ava che
jyare ke sidarahane chupayeli hati, te vastu je chupavavamam avi rahi hati
na to najhara hati na to hadathi vadhi
ni;sanka tene potana palanaharani moti moti nisani'omanthi ketalika nisani'o jo'i lidhi
sum tame lata ane ujhjhane joya
ane manat je trija che
sum tamara mate putro ane allaha mate putri'o che
a to have khuba ja an'yaya ni vata che

kharekhara a to eka nama che, je tame ane tamara bapa-dada'o'e (nama) rakhi lidha che. Allaha ta'ala'e te'ona ko'i purava nathi utaraya, a loko to phakata atakalo upara potani manacahata pachala padela che ane kharekhara temana palanahara taraphathi temani pase satya margadarsana avi pahoncyum che
sum dareka vyakti je icche tene malyum che
allahana ja hathamam che a jagata ane te jagata
ane ghana pharista'o akasomam che je'oni sipharisa kami pana phayado nahim pahocadi sake, parantu a alaga vata che ke allaha ta'ala potani khusi ane potani iccha pramane jene icche paravanagi api de
ni:Sanka je loko akhirata para imana nathi lavata te'o pharista'one stri'ona nama api de che
Jo ke te'one a vise kami pana jnana nathi. Te'o phakata potani kalpana ja kari rahya che. Ane ni:Sanka kalpana satya same kami kama nathi avati
to tame temanathi modhum pheravi lo, je amara smaranathi modhum pherave ane jemani iccha phakata dun'yavi jivana sivaya kami ja nathi
a ja te'ona jnanani sima che. Tamaro palanahara te'one khuba ja jane che je tena margathi bhatakela che. Ane tene pana khuba ja jane che je tena marga para che
ane allahanum ja che je kami akasomam che ane je kami dharatimam che jethi allaha ta'ala kharaba karya karavavalane temana karmono badalo ape ane sara karma karavavala'one saro badalo ape

te lokone je'o mota gunahothi bace che ane asrlilatathi pana (te'one khuba jane che) ham ko'i nana gunaha sivaya, (etale ke tha'i jaya) ni:Sanka taro palanahara vyapaka maphivalo che, te tamane khuba sari rite jane che, jyare ke tene tamane dharati manthi peda karya ane jyare ke tame tamari mata'ona garbhamam balaka hata, basa! Tame potani pavitrata pote ja bayana na karo, te ja daravavala'one khuba ja jane che
sum tame tene joyo jene modhum pheravi lidhum
ghanum ja ochu apyum ane hatha pana roki lidha
sum tene adrsyanum jnana che ke te (badhu ja) jo'i rahyo che
sum tene te vastuni khabara apavamam nathi avi je musana
ane pramanika ibrahimana pustika'omam hatum
ke ko'i vyakti bijano bhara nahim uthave
ane e ke dareka vyakti mate phakata te ja che jeno prayasa tene pote ja karyo che
ane e ke ni;sanka teno prayasa najikamam ja jovamam avase
pachi tene pure puro badalo apavamam avase
ane e ke tamara palanahara tarapha ja antima thekanum che
Ane e ke te ja hasave che ane te ja radave che
ane e ke te ja mrtyu ape che ane te ja jivita kare che
ane e ke tene ja jodaka etale ke nara ane mada peda karya che
tipa vade jyare ke tapakavavamam ave che
ane e ke tena ja sire biji vakhata jivita karavanum che
ane e ke te ja dhanavana banave che ane te ja dhana ape che
ane e ke te ja tara'ono raba che
ane e ke tene ja prathama adane nasta karya che
ane samudiyone pana (jemathi) ekane pana baki na chodayo
ane a pahela nuhani komane, ni:Sanka te'o khuba ja atyacari ane balavakhora hata
ane mu'ataphika (sahera athava ulataveli vasti'one) tene ja ultavi nakhi
pachi te'o para chava'i ga'i (etale ke temana para pat'tharo no varasada)
basa! He manavi tu potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amato upara jhaghado karisa
a (payagambara) cetavani apanara che, prathama cetavani apanara'omanthi
kayamata najika avi ga'i
allaha sivaya teno (nakki karela samaya) jahera karanara ko'i nathi
basa! Sum tame a vatathi nava'i pamo cho
ane haso cho. Radata nathi
(parantu) tame rami rahya cho
have allahani samaksa sijada karo ane (teni ja) bandagi karo
kayamata najika avi ga'i ane candra phati gayo
a loko, jo ko'i nisani jo'i le che to modhum pheravi le che ane kahi de che ke a to pahelathi cali avatu jadu che
te'o'e juthalavyu ane potani maneccha'onum anusarana karyo. Ane dareka karya nakki karela samaya pramane che
ni:Sanka temani pase te vato avi pahonci che jemam jhatakani (ni sikhamana) che
ane sampurna budhdhivali vata che. Parantu a daravanari vato'e pana ko'i phayado na pahoncadayo
Basa! (He payagambara) tame temanathi cheta raho. Je divase eka pokaravavalo anagamati vastu tarapha pokarase
a nameli ankho kabaromanthi evi rite nikalase jevake vikherayela tidam che
pokaravavala tarapha dodata hase ane inkari'o kahese a divasa ghano ja sakhata che
a loko pahela nuhani komana loko'e pana amara bandane juthalavya hata ane pagala kahim jhataki nakhyo hato
basa! Tene potana palanaharathi du'a kari ke hum lacara chum tum mari madada kara
basa! Ame akasana dvarane musaladhara varasadathi kholi nakhya
ane dharati manthi jharana'one vaheta kari didha. Basa! Te karya para jetalum pani mukaddara karavamam avyu hatum te nimita tha'i gayum
ane ame tene patiya ane khilavali (nauka) para savara kari didha
je amari dekharekha hethala cali rahi hati. A hato badalo te loko matejeno inkara karavamam avi rahyo hato
ane ni:Sanka ame a kis'sane nisani banavi baki rakhyo, basa! Ko'i che sikhamana prapta karanara
batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ane ni:Sanka ame kura'anane samajava mate sarala kari didhu che, basa! Ko'i che bodha grahana karanara
adani kome pana juthalavyum, basa! Batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ame temana para sakhata vavajhodum, eka bhayavaha divase mokalyum
je lokone upadi-upadine evi rite phenkatu hatum jemake mulamanthi ukhadela khajurana vrkso
batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ni:Sanka ame ame kura'anane samajava mate sarala kari didhu che, basa! Ko'i che bodha grahana karanara
samudani kome cetavani apanarane juthalavya
Ane kaheva lagya sum amara manthi eka vyaktini vatonum anusarana kari'e? Tyare to ame ni:Sanka bhula ane pagalapanamam padela ho'isum
sum amara manthi phakata tena para ja vahi utaravamam avi? Na parantu te to jutho ahankari che
have sau jani le se kale ke kona jutho ane ahankari hato
ni:Sanka ame temani kasoti mate untani mukalisum. Basa! (He saliha a.Sa.) Tame raha ju'o ane dhairya rakho
ham te'one cetavani api do ke pani te'oni vacce vahencani mate che, dareka potani vari para hajara thase
temane potana sathine bolavyo jene humalo karyo ane paga kapi nakhya
basa! Batavo mari yatana ane mari cetavani'o kevi hati
ame te'ona para eka avaja (bhayankara cisa) mokali. Basa! Eva tha'i gaya jeva ke kantani chundayeli vada
ame sikhamana mate kura'anane sarala kari didhu che, basa! Che ko'i je bodha grahana kare
lutani kome pana cetavani apanara'one juthalavya
ni:Sanka ame temana para pat'tharo no varasada mokalyo. Lutana gharavala sivaya temane ame saharina samaye
mara upakarathi bacavi lidha, dareka abharine ame avi ja rite badalo api'e chi'e
ni:Sanka (lute) te'one amari pakadathi daravya hata. Parantu temane cetavani apanara sathe (sanka ane) jhaghado karyo
ane (luta) ne te'o'e tena mahemano vise uskerya, basa! Ame te'one andhala kari didha, (ane kahi didhu) mari yatana ane mari pakadani maja cakho
ane sacci vata che ke te'one parodhamam ja eka jgya para nakki karela yatana'e nasta kari didha
basa! Mari yatana ane cetavani'ono maja cakho
ane ni:Sanka ame kura'anane sikhamana mate sarala kari didhum che, basa! Che ko'i je bodha grahana kare
ane phira'auna ni koma pase pana cetavani apanara avya
Te loko'e amari dareka nisani'o juthalavi. Basa! Ame te'one khuba ja vijayi, takatavara pakadanarani maphaka pakadi lidha
he inkari'o! Sum tamaru inkara karavum temana inkara karava jevum nathi? Athava tamara mate agalana grarthomam chutakaro lakhelo che
athava a loko kahe che ke ame vijaya pamanaru jutha che
najikamam ja a jutha hari jase, ane pitha batavi bhagi jase
parantu kayamata no samaya tena vacana pramane che ane kayamata ghani ja sakhata ane kadavi vastu che
ni;sanka duracari geramarge ane yatanamam che
je divase te'o potana modha bhera agamam ghasadine la'i javamam avase, (ane tene kahevamam avase) jahannamani agano maja cakho
ni:Sanka ame dareka vastune eka andaja para peda kari che
ane amaro adesa phakata eka vakhata ja hoya che jemake palakavaramam
ane ame tamara jeva ghanane nasta kari didha, basa! Che ko'i sikhamana grahana karanara
je kami pana te'o'e (karmo) karya che te badhu ja karmanondhamam lakhela che
(avi ja rite) dareka nani moti vata para lakhela che
ni:Sanka amaro dara rakhanara jannato ane naheromam che
sacum pratisthanum sthana, takatavara badasaha pase
atyanta dayalu'e
kura'ana sikhavadayum
tene ja manavinum sarjana karyu
ane tene bolata sikhavadayum
surya ane candra (nakki karela) hisaba pramane (cale) che
tara'o ane vrkso banne sijado kare che
tene (allaha) ja akasane uncu karyu ane tene ja trajava sthapita karya
jethi tame tolavamam atireka na karo
n'yaya sathe vajanane barabara rakho ane tolavamam kami na karo
ane tene ja sarjani'o mate dharatine pathari didhi
jemam phalaphaladi che ane gucchavala khajurana vrkso che
Ane danandara anaja che. Ane khusbudara phula che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
tene manavine evi avajavali mati vade peda karyo je thikara jevi hati
ane jinnatone agani jvala'othi peda karya
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
te raba che banne pasrcimo ane purvono
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
tene be samudro vaheta kari didha je ekabijathi bhali jaya che
te banne vacce eka padado che, tenathi vadhi nathi sakata
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
te bannemanthi moti ane paravalum nikale che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
ane allahani ja (malikimam) che te vahano je samudromam parvata maphaka ubha rahya che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
dharati para je kami che te nasa pamase
phakata tara palanaharani hasti ja, je mahana ane ijhajhatavali che baki rahi jase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
dareka akaso ane dharativala'o teni pase ja mange che. Dareka divase teni eka sana che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
(jinno ane manavi'ona jutho) najika manja ame paravaline (tamari tarapha dhyana) dhari da'isum
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
He jinnato ane manavi'ona jutho! Jo tamaramam akaso ane dharatina kinara'othi bahara nikali javani takata hoya to nikali java, vijaya ane takata vagara tame nathi nikali sakata
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
tamara para agani jvala'o ane dhummado chodavamam avase, pachi tame samano nahi kari sako
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
basa! Jyare ke akasa phatine lala tha'i jase, jevi rite ke lala camadum
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
te divase ko'i manavi athava jinnothi tena gunaho vise savala karavamam nahi ave
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
papi phakata mondhathi ja olakha'i jase ane temana kapalana vala ane paga pakadi levamam avase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
a che te jahannama jene papi'o juthalavata hata
te'o (jahannama) ane ukalata pani vacce cakkara marata rahese
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
ane te vyakti mate je potana palanahara same ubha rahevathi daryo. (Tena mate) be be jannato che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
(banne jannato) bharapura sakho ane dali'ovali hase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
te banne (jannato) mam be vaheta jharanam che
Basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
banne jannatomam dareka phalo be-be prakarana hase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
jannnati'o eva patharana para takiyo lagavi betha hase jemana astara ghatta resamana hase ane te banne jannatona phalo khuba ja najika hase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
tyam (saramala) nici najara rakhanari huro che, jemane a pahela ko'i jinna athava manavi'e hatha pana nahi lagadayo hoya
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
te huro hira ane moti'o jevi hase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
upakarano badalo upakara sivaya sum hoya sake
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
ane te banne vagara biji be jannato pana che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
je banne gica lilichama che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
temam be (josathi) ubharata jharana che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
temam phalo, khajura ane dadama hase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
temam uttama caritravali ane sundara stri'o che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
(Gora rangani) huro jannati tambu'omam rahevavali che
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
teni'one a pahela ko'i manavi athava jine hatha nathi lagavyo
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
lila galica ane uttama patharana para takiya lagavi betha hase
basa! (He manavi'o ane jinnato) tame potana palanaharani ka'i ka'i ne'amatone juthalavaso
tara palanaharanum nama khuba ja barakatavalum che, je ijhajhatadara ane prabhavasali che
jyare kayamata avi pahoncase
jene thavamam kami jutha nathi
te (kayamata) nica karavavali ane unca karavavali hase
jyare ke dharati dharatikampa sathe halavi devamam avase
ane parvato atyanta cure cura kari devamam avase
pachi te vikherayeli mati jeva tha'i jase
ane tame trana juthomam tha'i jaso
basa! Jamana hathavala keva sara hase. Jamana hathavala
ane daba hathavalani sum dasa che, daba hathavalani
ane je agalavala che te to agalavala ja che
te khuba ja najika rahevavala hase
ne'amatovali jannatomam che
(khuba ja motum) jutha to agala rahevavala'o num hase
ane thodaka pachala loko manthi
a loko sonana tarathi banela asano para
eka-bija same takiya lagavi betha hase
te'o pase eva balako hase je'o hammesa (balako ja) rahese. Ava-ja karata hase
pyala, jaga ane evum jama la'ine je vaheti
jenathi na to mathamam dukhavo thase, na to budhdhi niskriya thase
ane eva phalo la'ine je te'one managamata hase
ane pankhi'ona gosta je te'one pasanda hase
ane moti moti ankhovali apsara'o
Je chupayela moti'o jevi hase
a badalo che temana karmono
na tyam phalatum vata sambhalase ane na to papani vata
phakata salama ja salamani avaja hase
ane jamana hathavala ketala uttama che. Jamana hathavala'o
te'o kanta vagara
ane eka pachi eka khunta
ane lamba lamba padachaya
ane vaheta pani
ane ghana ja phalomam
je na to khatma thase, na to roki levamam avase
ane unca unca patharana para hase
ame te'o (ni patni'one) khasa tarikathi banavi che
ane ame teni'one kumarika'o banavi didhi che
mohabbata karanari ane sarakhi vayo vali
jamana hathavala'o mate che
ghana loko agala rahevavala loko manthi hase
ane ghanum ja motum jutha pachala rahevavala'onum che
ane daba hathavala, keva che daba hathavala
garama hava ane garama pani mam (hase)
ane kala dhumadana padachayamam
je na to thando hase ane na to khusa karanaro
ni:Sanka a loko a pahela ghana ja thathamam hata
ane mota mota gunaha para adaga raheta
ane kaheta hata sum ame mrtyu pamisum, mati ane hadaka tha'i ja'isum to sum ame pacha bijivara jivita karavamam avisum
ane sum amara agalana bapa-dada'o pana
tame kahi do ke ni:Sanka agala ane pachalana saune
jarurathi bhega kari devamam avase, eka nakki karela divase
pachi tame he pathabhrasto! He juthalavanara'o
tame jarurathi
ane tenathi ja tame peta bharaso
pachi tena para garama ukalatum pani piso
pivavala pana tarasya unto jeva
kayamatana divase te'oni a mahemani hase
ame ja tamara saunum sarjana karyum che. Pachi tame kema manata nathi
Ha, evum to janavo ke je virya tame tapakavo cho
sum tene (manavi) tame banavo cho? Athava to peda karanara ame ja che
ame ja tamara para mrtyune nakki kari didhu che. Ane ame tenathi harela nathi
ke tamari jagya para tamara jeva ketalayane peda kari da'i'e ane tamane pharithi a jagatamam pana peda kari da'i'e jeni tamane kami pana khabara nathi
tamane nisrcitapane pahela sarjana vise khabara ja che, pachi kema bodha grahana nathi karata
ha to e pana janavo ke tame je kami pana vavo cho
teni vavani tame ja karo cho athava to ame ja vavetara che
jo ame icchi'e to tene cure cura kari da'i'e ane tame asrcaryathi vato ghadavamam ja rahi ja'o
ke amara para bhara tha'i gayo che
parantu ame khuba ja ajana rahi gaya
ha e to janavo ke je pani tame pivo cho
tene vadalo manthi tame ja utaro cho athava to ame utari'e chi'e
jo amari iccha hoya to ame tene kadavum jhera banavi da'i'e. Pachi tame amaro abhara kema nathi manata
ham e pana janavo ke je aga tame salagavo cho
tena vuksane tame peda karyu che athava ame tene peda karavavala che
ame tene sikhamana mate ane musapharona phayada mate banavyum che
basa! Potana ghana ja mahanatavala palanaharana namanum smarana karata raho
basa! Hum soganda kha'um chum tara'ona padavana
ane jo tamane jnana hoya to a ghani ja moti soganda che
ni:Sanka a kura'ana khuba ja ijajatavalum che
je eka suraksita pustakamam che
tene phakata pavitra loko ja adi sake che
a jagatana palanahara taraphathi avatarita karelum che
sum tame a vatane saman'ya jano cho
ane potana bhagamam phakata juthalavavanum ja nakki karyum che
Basa! Jyare jiva gala sudhi pahonci jase
ane tame te samaye ankho vade jota rahi jaso
ame te vyakti sathe tamara karata vadhare najika ho'i'e chi'e, parantu tame nathi jo'i sakata
basa! Jo tame ko'ina kahevamam nathi
ane jo a vatana saca hoya to a jivane pache lavi bata'o
basa! Je ko'i allahana darabaramam najika karelo hase
tene to arama che, khoraka che ane aramadayaka jannata che
ane je vyakti jamana (hatha) vala'o manthi che
to pana salamati che tara mate ke tum jamana hathavala'o manthi che
parantu jo ko'i juthalavanara pathabhrasto manthi che
tena mate ukalata garama panini mahemani che
ane jahannamamam javanum che
a khabara kharekhara saci ane satya che
basa! Tum potana mahana palanaharana namanum smarana kara
akaso ane dharatimam je kami pana che (badhum ja) allahana namanum smarana kari rahya che, te mahana, hikamatavalo che
akaso ane dharatinum samrajya tenum ja che. Te ja jivana ape che ane te ja mrtyu pana ane te dareka vastu para saktimana che
te ja prathama che ane te ja chelle che, te ja jhahira che ane te ja chupo ane te dareka vastune khuba ja sari rite jane che

te (allaha) ja che jene akaso ane dharatinum cha divasamam sarjana karyu, pachi arsa para birajamana tha'i gayo, te (khuba ja) jane che te vastune je jaminamam jaya ane je temanthi nikale ane je akasa parathi nice ave ane je kami cadhine jaya ane jyam pana tame cho te tamari sathe che ane je kami pana tame kari rahya cho (tene) allaha jo'i rahyo che
akaso ane dharatinum samrajya tenum ja che ane dareka karya teni ja tarapha mokalavamam ave che
Te ja ratrine divasamam pherave che ane te ja divasane ratrimam pherave che ane hrdayona bhedone te khuba ja sari rite jane che

allaha ane tena payagambara para imana lavi do ane dhana manthi kharca karo jemam allaha'e tamane (bijana) labharthi banavya che. Basa! Tamara manthi je imana lave ane dana kare tene puskala savaba (punya) malase

tame allaha para imana kema nathi lavata? Jyare ke payagambara pote tamane potana palanahara para imana lavavanum kahe che ane jo tame imanavala hoya to te to tamarathi thosa vacana pana la'i cukaya che
te (allaha) ja che je potana banda para spasta ayato utare che, jethi te tamane andhakarathi prakasa tarapha la'i jaya. Ni:Sanka allaha ta'ala tamara para namrata karanara ane daya karanara che

tamane sum tha'i gayum che ke tame allahana margamam dana nathi karata? Asalamam akaso ane dharatini varasa'i no malika (ekalo) allaha ja che, tamara manthi je loko'e vijaya pahela allahana margamam dana karyu che ane yudhdha karyu che te'o (bijana) jeva nathi, parantu te'o temana karata uttama darajjavala che, jemane vijaya pachi dana karyu ane jehada karyu. Ham sara karmonum vacana allaha'e te saune karelum che. Je kami pana tame kari rahya cho tene allaha khuba sari rite jane che
kona che je allaha ta'alane sari rite udhara ape, pachi allaha ta'ala tene tena mate vadharato jaya che ane tena mate manapasanda badalo nakki tha'i jaya

(kayamatana) divase tame jo'i leso ke imanavala puruso ane stri'ono prakasa temana agala agala ane te'ona jamane dodi rahyu hase. Aje tamane te jannatoni subhasucana che jeni nice nahero vaheti che, jemam hammesanu avasa che, a che moti saphalata

Te divase dhongi purusa ane stri imanavala'one kahese ke amari pratiksa to karo, ke ame pana tamara prakasathi kami prakasa melavi la'i'e, javaba apavamam avase ke tame potani pachala phari java ane prakasa sodho, pachi te banneni vacce eka divala kari devamam avase, jemam baranum pana hase, tena andarana bhagamam ananda hase ane baharana bhagamam yatana hase

a loko rado padine temane (jannati'o ne) kahese ke sum ame tamari sathe na hata, te'o kahese ke ha hata to khara pana tame pote vidrohi bani gaya hata ane pratiksa karavamam ja rahi gaya ane sanka karata rahya ane tamane tamara bekarana sokho'e dhoka mam ja rakhya, tyam sudhi ke allahano adesa avi pahoncyo ane tamane allaha vise dhoko apanare dhoka mam ja rakhya
basa! Aje tamari pase na to???? (Ane na to badalo) kabula karavamam avase ane na inkari'othi, tamara (sau) num thekanum jahannama che, te ja tamari dosta che ane te ghanum ja kharaba thekanum che

sum haju sudhi imanavala'o mate samaya nathi avyo ke te'ona hrdayo allahani yadamam ane je satya marga avatarita tha'i cukayo che tenathi narama tha'i jaya ane temana jeva na tha'i jaya jemane te pahela grantha apavamam avyo hato pachi jyare te'o para eka lambo galo pasara tha'i cukayo to temana hrdayo sakhata tha'i gaya ane temanamam ghanaja vidrohi che
kharekhara tame jani lo ke allaha ja dharatine tena mrtyu pachi phari jivita kari de che, ame to tamara mate amari ayatonum varnana kari didhum jethi tame samaji lo
ni:Sanka dana karavavala puruso ane stri'o ane je allahane nikhalasatathi udhara api rahya che te'o mate te vadharavamam avase, ane te'o mate manapasanda savaba che

Allaha ane tena payagambara para je imana rakhe che te ja loko potana palanaharani najika saca ane sahida che, te'o mate te'ono badalo ane te'o mate prakasa che ane je loko inkara kare che ane amari ayatone juthalave che te jahannami che

jani lo ke duniyanum jivana phakata ramata-gamata, sanagara ane eka- bijamam ahankara ane dhana tatha santano babate eka bijana dekhadekhimam potane srestha batavavanum che, jevi rite ke varasada ane teni pedavara khedutone lubhave che, pachi jyare te suki padi jaya che to pila rangamam tame tene ju'o cho, pachi te cure cura tha'i jaya che. Ane akheratamam sakhata yatana ane allahani maphi ane rajamandi che, ane duniyanum jivana phakata dhoko ja che, te vagara kami nathi

(avo) bhago potana palanaharani ksama tarapha ane teni jannato tarapha teni coda'i akasa ane dharatini coda'i jetali che, a te loko mate taiyara karavamam avi che je allaha ane tena payagambaro para imana dharave che. A allahani krpa che jene icche ape ane allaha ghano ja krpalu che
ko'i musibata tamane ane tamara jivone duniyamam nathi pahoncati parantu te pahela ke ame tene peda kari'e, te eka khasa pustakamam lakheli che, a (karya) allaha mate (khuba ja) sarala che
jethi tame na maleli vastu para ranja na karo ane na to apeli vastu para itara'o ane ahankari'one allaha pasanda nathi karato
je kanjusi kare ane bijane (pana) kanjusini sikhamana ape, sambhalo je pana modhum pherave allaha beniyajha ane prasansane layaka che

Ni:Sanka ame amara payagambarone khulla purava api mokalya ane teni sathe pustaka ane trajavum avatarita karyu, jethi loko n'yaya para adaga rahe ane ame lokhanda utaryu jemam sakhata'i ane takata che, ane loko mate bija ghanam phayada che ane a mate pana ke allaha jani le ke teni ane tena payagambaroni madada vana dekhe kona kare che, ni:Sanka allaha takatavara ane mahana che

ni:Sanka ame nuha ane ibrahima (a.Sa.) Ne (payagambara banavi) mokalya ane ame te banneni santanomam payagambari ane grantho paramparita rakhya, to temanthi ketalake to satya marga apanavyo ane temanthi ghana ja avajnakari rahya

tyara pachi pana ame amara payagambarone eka pachi eka mokalta rahya, ane te pachi isa bina marayama (a.Sa.) Ne mokalya, ane temane injila api ane temana mananara'ona hrdayomam daya ane namrata peda kari didhi, ham rahabaniyyata (san'yasi) to te loko'e pote banavi didhi, ame te'ona para jaruri nahatu theravyu, allahani raja sivaya, to te loko'e tenum pure puru palana na karyu, to pana ame te'ona manthi je imana lavya hata te'one teno badalo apyo ane temanamam ghana loko avajnakari hata

he loko je'o imana lavya cho allahathi darata raho, ane tena payagambara para imana lavo, allaha tamane potani krpano bamano bhaga apase, ane tamane prakasa apase, jena prakasamam tame hari- phari sakaso ane tamara gunaha pana mapha kari dese, allaha ksama karanara, dayalu che
a etala mate ke granthavala'o jani le ke allahani krpana ko'i bhagamam pana te'one kami adhikara nathi, ane (dareka) krpa allahana ja hathamam che, te jene icche ape, ane allaha che ja ghano krpalu
